# ğŸ“¦ MVP Blueprint â€“ **ShopSwift**  
> **Oneâ€‘line Pitch**  
> *â€œFast, frictionâ€‘free online shopping for busy people â€“ get what you need in minutes, delivered in hours.â€*

---

## 1ï¸âƒ£ Product Name  
**ShopSwift**

---

## 2ï¸âƒ£ Oneâ€‘Line Pitch  
Fast, frictionâ€‘free online shopping for busy people â€“ get what you need in minutes, delivered in hours.

---

## 3ï¸âƒ£ Target Users  
| Persona | Key Traits | How They Use ShopSwift |
|---------|------------|------------------------|
| **Sarah â€œShopâ€‘Fastâ€ Patel** | 28â€¯yo, marketing coordinator, busy mom | Uses mobile site to quickly add household staples, applies saved coupons, chooses sameâ€‘day delivery. |
| **Miguel â€œSupplyâ€‘Proâ€ Hernandez** | 45â€¯yo, HVAC business owner | Uses desktop to reorder parts, applies business discount, exports order confirmations for accounting. |
| **Aisha â€œTrendâ€‘Seekerâ€ Kim** | 22â€¯yo, college student | Browses trending fashion, uses AR tryâ€‘on, saves items to wishlist, shares on Instagram. |

*(See full personas in the â€œUser Personasâ€ section below.)*

---

## 4ï¸âƒ£ Problems to Solve  

| Problem | Why It Matters |
|---------|----------------|
| **Timeâ€‘consuming browsing** | Users want to shop in <10â€¯min. |
| **Hidden fees & slow checkout** | Frustrates users, increases cart abandonment. |
| **Uncertain product quality** | Leads to returns, lowers trust. |
| **No quick reâ€‘order** | Smallâ€‘business owners waste time searching. |
| **Hard to find deals** | Budgetâ€‘conscious shoppers miss savings. |
| **Slow imageâ€‘heavy pages** | Mobile users experience lag. |

---

## 5ï¸âƒ£ MVP Features  
*(From the feature generator â€“ mustâ€‘have only)*

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Product catalog** | Basic categories, search, pagination |
| **Product detail page** | Images, description, price, stock |
| **Shopping cart** | Add/remove, quantity update, localStorage persistence |
| **Secure checkout** | Stripe/PayPal integration, singleâ€‘page flow |
| **User authentication** | Register, login, password reset, JWT |
| **Order history** | View past orders, status |
| **Admin CRUD** | Products, orders (minimal UI) |
| **Reviews** | Optional rating & comment |
| **Wishlist** | Save items for later |
| **Order tracking** | Realâ€‘time status updates |

---

## 6ï¸âƒ£ User Journey (Stepâ€‘byâ€‘Step)

1. **Landing** â€“ User lands on the home page, sees â€œQuickâ€‘Shopâ€ banner.  
2. **Browse** â€“ Uses search or category filters to find products.  
3. **Product Detail** â€“ Views images, reads description, checks stock.  
4. **Add to Cart** â€“ Clicks â€œAdd to Cartâ€; cart icon updates.  
5. **Review Cart** â€“ Opens cart sidebar, adjusts quantities or removes items.  
6. **Checkout** â€“ Clicks â€œCheckoutâ€, enters shipping address, selects delivery speed.  
7. **Payment** â€“ Enters card details via Stripe/PayPal; receives confirmation.  
8. **Order Confirmation** â€“ Sees order summary, receives email/SMS.  
9. **Tracking** â€“ Views order status in the â€œOrdersâ€ section; receives push notifications.  
10. **Repeat** â€“ Adds new items or reâ€‘orders previous items via â€œReorderâ€ button.

---

## 7ï¸âƒ£ System Architecture  
*(From the system_architect output â€“ simplified diagram & key components)*

```
â”‚  Browser (React SPA)  â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
        â”‚ HTTPS
        â–¼
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚  ALB (HTTPS)          â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
        â”‚
        â–¼
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚  ECS Fargate (API)    â”‚
â”‚  â”œâ”€ NestJS (REST)     â”‚
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Redis (Cache)     â”‚
â”‚  â”œâ”€ BullMQ (Queue)    â”‚
â”‚  â””â”€ PostgreSQL (RDS)  â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜

```

**Key Points**

- **Stateless API** â€“ Dockerized NestJS, autoâ€‘scaling via ECS Fargate.  
- **Cache** â€“ Redis for session & product caching.  
- **Queue** â€“ BullMQ for order processing & email notifications.  
- **Database** â€“ PostgreSQL (RDS) for ACID guarantees.  
- **Static assets** â€“ S3 + CloudFront for fast image delivery.  
- **Security** â€“ HTTPS everywhere, WAF, IAM roles, secrets in Secrets Manager.  

---

## 8ï¸âƒ£ Database Tables (PostgreSQL)

| Table | Columns (sample) | Notes |
|-------|------------------|-------|
| `users` | id, email, password_hash, name, role, created_at, updated_at | `role` = customer/admin |
| `products` | id, sku, name, description, price_cents, currency, stock_qty, image_url, created_at, updated_at | |
| `orders` | id, user_id, status, total_cents, currency, shipping_address, created_at, updated_at | status: pending, paid, shipped, cancelled |
| `order_items` | id, order_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price_cents | |
| `carts` | id, user_id, created_at | One cart per user |
| `cart_items` | id, cart_id, product_id, quantity | |
| `reviews` | id, user_id, product_id, rating, comment, created_at | |
| `payments` | id, order_id, provider, status, transaction_id, created_at | |

**Indexes**

- `users(email)` â€“ unique  
- `products(sku)` â€“ unique  
- `orders(user_id, status)` â€“ for history queries  
- `order_items(order_id)` â€“ join performance  

---

## 9ï¸âƒ£ API Endpoints (REST)

| Resource | Method | Path | Auth | Description |
|----------|--------|------|------|-------------|
| **Auth** | POST | `/api/auth/register` | âŒ | Register new user |
| **Auth** | POST | `/api/auth/login` | âŒ | Login, returns JWT |
| **Auth** | POST | `/api/auth/logout` | âœ… | Invalidate token |
| **Products** | GET | `/api/products` | âŒ | List (paginated) |
| **Products** | GET | `/api/products/:id` | âŒ | Detail |
| **Cart** | GET | `/api/cart` | âœ… | Get current cart |
| **Cart** | POST | `/api/cart/items` | âœ… | Add item |
| **Cart** | PATCH | `/api/cart/items/:id` | âœ… | Update quantity |
| **Cart** | DELETE | `/api/cart/items/:id` | âœ… | Remove item |
| **Orders** | POST | `/api/orders` | âœ… | Create order (checkout) |
| **Orders** | GET | `/api/orders` | âœ… | List user orders |
| **Orders** | GET | `/api/orders/:id` | âœ… | Order detail |
| **Reviews** | POST | `/api/products/:id/reviews` | âœ… | Add review |
| **Wishlist** | POST | `/api/wishlist` | âœ… | Add item |
| **Wishlist** | GET | `/api/wishlist` | âœ… | List wishlist |

> **Headers** â€“ `Authorization: Bearer <jwt>` for protected routes.  
> **Error Handling** â€“ Standard HTTP status codes + `{ error, details? }` JSON body.

---

## ğŸ”§ 10ï¸âƒ£ Tech Stack (Recommended by tech_stack_recommender)

| Layer | Technology | Why |
|-------|------------|-----|
| **Frontâ€‘end** | React (Vite), Redux Toolkit, Reactâ€‘Query, Tailwind CSS, Headless UI | Rapid prototyping, responsive UI, state & serverâ€‘state management |
| **Backâ€‘end** | NestJS (TypeScript), Express, Passport.js (JWT), class-validator, TypeORM | Modular, scalable, strong typing |
| **Database** | PostgreSQL (RDS) | ACID, relational data |
| **Cache** | Redis (ElastiCache) | Session & query caching |
| **Queue** | BullMQ (Redis) | Order processing, email jobs |
| **Payments** | Stripe / PayPal SDK | PCIâ€‘DSS compliant, tokenized card data |
| **Storage** | Amazon S3 | Product images, thumbnails |
| **CDN** | CloudFront | Global edge caching |
| **Load Balancer** | Application Load Balancer (ALB) | HTTPS termination, routing |
| **Container Orchestration** | ECS Fargate | Serverless containers, autoâ€‘scaling |
| **CI/CD** | GitHub Actions | Build, test, deploy |
| **IaC** | Terraform / AWS CDK | Reproducible infrastructure |
| **Monitoring** | CloudWatch + Prometheus (optional) | Metrics, logs, alerts |
| **Security** | WAF, ACM, Secrets Manager | OWASP protection, TLS, secrets |

---

## ğŸš€ 11ï¸âƒ£ Future Features (Postâ€‘MVP)

| Feature | Description | Priority |
|---------|-------------|----------|
| **Advanced Search & Filters** | Price range, brand, ratings, availability | Medium |
| **Subscription / Reâ€‘order** | Autoâ€‘replenish household staples | Medium |
| **Multiâ€‘vendor Marketplace** | Allow thirdâ€‘party sellers | High |
| **Dynamic Pricing & Coupons** | Tiered discounts, promo codes | Medium |
| **Social Login & Sharing** | Google, Apple, Facebook | Low |
| **AR Tryâ€‘On** | For fashion items | Low |
| **Internationalization** | Multiâ€‘currency, multiâ€‘language | Medium |
| **Analytics Dashboard** | Sales, traffic, conversion | High |
| **Chatbot Support** | AIâ€‘powered FAQ & order tracking | Medium |
| **Mobile App (Native)** | iOS/Android for better UX | Medium |

---

## ğŸ“Œ Quick Checklist for Launch

1. **Code** â€“ Commit to GitHub, run unit & integration tests.  
2. **Docker** â€“ Build & push API & frontend images to ECR.  
3. **Infra** â€“ Terraform apply (VPC, ALB, ECS, RDS, Redis, S3, CloudFront).  
4. **CI/CD** â€“ GitHub Actions deploy to ECS.  
5. **DNS** â€“ Route53 record pointing to ALB.  
6. **SSL** â€“ ACM cert, ALB listener.  
7. **Monitoring** â€“ Enable CloudWatch dashboards, set alarms.  
8. **Security** â€“ Enable WAF, set IAM roles, rotate secrets.  
9. **Payment** â€“ Configure Stripe/PayPal webhook endpoints.  
10. **Launch** â€“ Open beta to a small user group, gather feedback.

---

### ğŸ‰ Final Thought  
With **ShopSwift** youâ€™ll deliver a lean, fastâ€‘toâ€‘market eâ€‘commerce MVP that solves real pain points for busy shoppers and smallâ€‘business owners alike. The architecture is modular, cloudâ€‘native, and ready to scale as you add new features and grow your user base. Happy building!
